Package Entities

Class OrderProduct

java.lang.Object
Entities.OrderProduct
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderProduct extends Object implements Serializable
OrderProduct represent a product in an order, it contains productID, product name, price, quant and cartQuantity the difference between quant and cartQuantity, is that quant is the quantity available in the db, and cartQuantity is the quantity in the cart
See Also:

      public boolean addToCart()
      add 1 to cartQuant int value only if cartQuant is smaller than quant
      Returns:
